thread.title: Emily Ratajkowski Calls Out NYT Reporter For Spreading Nasty Rumor About Melania’s Past
thread.title_full: Emily Ratajkowski Calls Out NYT Reporter For Spreading Nasty Rumor About Melania’s Past

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Emily Ratajkowski Calls Out NYT Reporter For Spreading Nasty Rumor About Melania’s Past
text:
07:55pm February 13, 2017   
The liberal media has been doing this strange thing where they think it’s OK to report completely unsubstantiated stories with unnamed sources to smear Trump. 
Remember the BuzzFeed debacle? 
One of the fake news stories spreading around the internet lately is that Melania Trump used to be a prostitute. 
According to supermodel Emily Ratajkowski, a New York Times reporter is running around town spreading that nasty rumor. 
Ratajkowski wasn’t too pleased about it… 
From Washington Examiner : 
“Sat next to a journalist from the NYT last night who told me ‘Melania is a hooker.’ Whatever your politics it’s crucial to call this out for … what it is: slut shaming. I don’t care about her nudes or sexual history and no one should,” the 25-year-old Ratajkowski tweeted in two messages about her experience at a New York Fashion Week event Sunday night. 
“Gender specific attacks are disgusting sexist bullshit,” added Ratajkowski, who has publicly opposed President Trump ‘s policies on a number of issues, including abortion and immigration . 
She’s absolutely right. 
Gotta give her some props for standing up for what’s right even if it doesn’t jive with her personal politics. 
Wish more people would do that. LIKE this article?
